Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: Yes, Pre-sales for the private investor? For the unsold token, we are consider to burn or use to reward user who deposit TIIM as a Patron. At this moment, The bonus for private sales is 20% with a minimum is 1ETH. We want to raise about 1,8M. About the exchange, we do the listing as much as we can but can not disclose at this moment. Kucoin or Liquid is one of exchange we want to be listed.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company

There are a very little volume and activity. Hope to see TIM at Kucoin exchange. This is really good middle exchange.

Author: thanhphank34
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: For the private sales is about 280K and presales is about 100K. Patron is one of our feature: Patrons are TriipMiles holders who believe and support for sustainable growth of travel. A TriipMiles holder becomes a Patron when she/he acquires stake of any amount TriipMiles above 50 in each epoch. A Patron can resign, but the tokens will be locked for the next 7 days after the resignation. Reward: The reward a Patron receives in each epoch is proportional to the amount of TriipMiles he/she holds. 1.8 is the rest we need to raise to reach hardcap( 2.4m).  For next sale period, we accept both ETH and TOMO - not BTC.

Author: gembira
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: So as I understand you paying to booking and Booking reserve rooms in hotels? But you paying in crypto or fiat? As I know Booking don't accept crypto right now. This is really profitable for you change crypto to fiat and hold the same price as Booking with all this confersations and fees ?

Author: thanhphank34
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: We are working on the web design for the booking hotel - the traveler do the booking direct at our website and reserve like in booking.com page. The payment depends on the travelers - crypto or fiat - but we pay to booking.com in fiat. When booking accomodations, traveler will deposit the a small amount of the booking price with TIIM.  The Triip Protocol ensures that travelers will fulfill their bookings through the deposits and by rewarding them with TIIM sent to their electronic wallet app for hotel booking fulfillment. Then they will pay with fiat at hotel while checkout. Traveler will get back all deposit plus an additional 5% of their total booking in TIIM straight to their wallet.  This mechanism will create a small the booking cancel rate compared to Booking.com and other accommodations booking services.  Last but not least, both traveler and hotel get 0.5% reward in TIIM when they provide rating after check out.

Author: thanhphank34
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: Website | ICO page | White Paper | Whitelist | Medium blog | Twitter | Facebook Reddit | Telegram Official channel | Telegram Discussion channel.  Triip Protocol Building the first blockchain-powered sustainable economy for 1.2b travelers  Triip Protocol is created by Triip Pte. Ltd - the pioneer blockchain firm active in Asia. The profitable travel blockchain startup licensed by Singapore Tourism Board was founded in 2014 and has since taken in $835,000 in venture capital funding and enjoyed nearly 400 percent in year-over-year growth. Triip has grown a global brand that travellers and respectable publishers like The Wall Street Journal, CNN, TheNextWeb, Forbes, Al Jazeera, and Thomson Reuters all love. Triip is also a board member at the Pacific Asia Travel Association and the official member of World Committee on Tourism Ethics - an program by United Nation World Travel Organization. Triip‚Äôs CSR project SaveYourOcean.com to reduce the use of plastic bottles to save the ocean has won top prize at Sustainable Development Goal Challenge 2017 by United Nation Development Program in Vietnam.  Triip Protocol: Answer the hardest questions in Travel Industry: Who will travel to Where and When? How to reduce the Advertsing Fee to almost zero? How to reduce Customer Acquisition cost?  TriipMiles is the main utility token in the Triip Protocol. It‚Äôs used to exchange data and value between Triip Protocol smart contracts, travel businesses, travellers and locals with a network of partnerships in 229 countries. TriipMiles (TIIM) can then be used to reserve 28,859,813 listings include 5,539,347 listings of homes, apartments and other unique places to stay, and get a 5% rebate in 137,678 destinations in 229 countries and territories. In additional, travellers can use TIIM to buy one of the 6,000 one-of-a-kind tours in 100 countries, global wifi data in 131 countries or purchase in-room entertainment as well as book local transportation and get other local services.  How does it work? 1. User Flow for Booking Travel Services: For Traveler: A. Register Account B. Travel mining with travel plan submission: Traveler can create travel plans within Triip Protocol app. For each travel plan submitted, user will receive 88 TIIM, equal to US$ 1, into their wallet. C. Booking Travel services: Traveler can browse all the tours, travel services, and promotions in Triip Protocol app. She can pay for tour booking with both TIIM and fiat. And when choose to pay with TriipMiles, the price is always 10% lower when pay with fiat. D. Post-trip activities: After finished the tour, traveler can rate, and review the services she used. She will receive incentive with TIIM for her reviews. By sharing and referring friends, she can earn additional TIIM with every succesful booking. These rewards are funded by Triip Protocol incentive pool   For Business: All businesses must be verified (KYC) by Triip Protocol. After completing all the business information, business owner can list his products and services on Triip Protocol apps. To start using Triip Protocol for Business, partner must top up into their wallet with both fiat or TIIM.  Business partner can use the matching feature of Triip Protocol for Business to create targeted discount for traveler based on their travel plan data. Once approval, their offers will be shown in Traveler's app according to their travel plan.  Triip Protocol Business app uses cost-per-booking model. Business partners only pay for successful bookings.  With our 2-way review system, partner can give feedback to rate and review the travelers. By reviewing the traveler, partner will receive 0.5% of the total transaction value (from incentive pool).   2. User Flow for Booking Accomodation: When booking accomodations, traveler will deposit the amount to the booking price with TIIM.  The Triip Protocol ensures that travelers will fulfill their bookings through the deposits and by rewarding them with TIIM sent to their electronic wallet app for hotel booking fulfillment. They can also pay with fiat at hotel and receive full money while checkout, plus an additional 5% of their total booking in TIIM straight to their wallet.  This mechanism will create a small the booking cancel rate compared to Booking.com and other accommodations booking services.   What is our unfair advantages? First to market: Bhutan, Type-A Retreat, Global Travel Entrepreneur Challenge (GTEC 2016) Technology: Our backend is Ruby on Rail with ready API allowing flexible upgrades and integrations to other system. Operation Efficiencyriip has been extremely capital efficient, leveraging on our core team and just US$34K in ads spend to achieve US$1.2M in revenue in 4 years. Lowest Fee: With Triip Protocol, Triip will give 100% of the TriipMiles listed on tour from travellers to local tour guides via TriipMiles, thanks to smart contracts automating transactions that bypass commission-based platforms, financial institutions, and currency denominations. We only charge 3.5% service fees from the traveller. Huge Inventory: Through our partnership with Booking.com, Triip traveler can book a stay and get 5% TIIM rebate at  28,875,236 listings include 5,782,338 listings of homes, apartments and other unique places to stay, and are located in 145,362 destinations in 228 countries and territories. Besides, global accommodation, Triip traveler can also book 6,000 unique local tours in 100 countries. Strong support: Triip earned a seed round investment of US$500K from Gobi Partners/MAVCAP and the CEO of the Pacific Asia Travel Association (PATA), Dr Mario Hardy.  ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî ICO ENDS NEXT MONTH; DON'T MISS THIS EXCLUSIVE OPPORTUNITY TO PARTICIPATE IN TRIIP PROTOCOL ECOSYSTEM NOW! LEARN MORE ABOUT US HERE

Author: Delphinus
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: I'm not clear on the use case of the token? Why would be as investors buy it?

Author: thanhphank34
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Triip Protocol - TIIM - Triip - The Sustainable Travel Tech Company
Body: Hello Delphinus, ‚ÄúIn contrast to many other ICOs, we already have a  profitable business and a functioning platform in 227 countries.‚Äù We have the resources of tours and rooms (The collaboration with Booking.com) already. The Token TIIM is released based on the issue of the booking platform: Tour Approval and Dispute settlement:  Inefficient process. Like Airbnb, Uber, Grab .. Triip became the bottle neck to approve new tour listing.. A $31B giant like Airbnb still approves new homes and experiences manually. Everytime, there is a dispute, the company has to rely on expensive full-time staffs to resolve. Airbnb is struggling to add new local experiences due to their costly process. Traditional method like tour guide license from tourism board may qualify a person knowledge but not their quality of service.    Customer Acquisition: Monopolized by inefficient middlemen. We either have to wait for months or even years to be listed on TripAdvisor or pay thousands of dollars on Google Ads to be seen by travellers. It increases the cost of customers acquisition for tour operator, local guides,hotel owners‚Ä¶  reducing transparency and generating fraudulent transactions.  Cross-border payment : Still no massified and costly. Current we can‚Äôt pay our local guides in 100 different countries instantly. A significant margin is being taken by payment processors and other fintech middlemen. Our 3-day-after-tour escrow model ensures quality of service but it is not the best option for local tour guides  And why TriipMiles can handle it: A decentralized approval and arbitration system that approves new local tour guides, verify travellers and resolves user disputes. This system utilizes trusted digital fingerprint protocol on the Ethereum blockchain, with a rating determined by immutable review and scoring interchange between P2P entities (such as local and travellers).      A P2P Referral protocol guarantees not only that the travellers view tours and accomodation but that they actually book those products from suppliers. Hotel owners, local guides can pay directly to users that bring them real booking from real customers. The money saved by hotel owners, local guides is used to award users with TriipMiles token. The value of Triip ecosystem will grow when users using their earned TriipMiles or by purchasing them through exchanges.  A secure cross-border payment that allows two authenticated P2P entities to send and receive money that gets held in TriipMiles Tokens until after a successful exchange of services between the two entities
